and export tooling.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "microlens-submit" %}
{% set filename_name = name | replace("-", "_") %}
{% set version = "0.16.3" %}
{% set python_min = "3.10" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ filename_name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e1081a269bfa164e53f7c1e1e65789bc22d95a99c0dc569b40e4d2fe555cac0b

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script:
    - python -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv
    - if exist %PREFIX%\Scripts\microlens-submit.exe del %PREFIX%\Scripts\microlens-submit.exe  # [win]
    - echo @echo off> %PREFIX%\Scripts\microlens-submit.bat  # [win]
    - echo "%PREFIX%\python.exe" -m microlens_submit.cli %%*>> %PREFIX%\Scripts\microlens-submit.bat  # [win]
    - copy %PREFIX%\Scripts\microlens-submit.bat %PREFIX%\Scripts\microlens-submit.cmd /Y  # [win]

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - pydantic >=2.0.0
    - typer >=0.9.0
    - rich >=13.0.0
    - pyyaml >=6.0
    - markdown >=3.4.0
    - importlib_resources >=1.0.0

test:
  commands:
    - microlens-submit --help
    - python -c "import microlens_submit; import microlens_submit.cli"
    - pip check
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip

about:
  home: https://github.com/AmberLee2427/microlens-submit
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: A tool for managing and submitting microlensing solutions
  description: |
    microlens-submit provides a Python API and CLI for managing submissions
    to microlensing data challenges, including validation, dossier generation,
    and export tooling.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - AmberLee2427
